name: Conscience Level 1 PathMasters
description:
Making choices in a chaotic world can be very difficult without sound judgment, Path master delivers an example of this. Path masters is based in a generic toon version of reality, with a toon conscience represented by bad and good versions of each character in the game. Then there's the path masters which are toon representative of experience, wisdom, and knowledge. All three equals the Path Masters.

Conscience Path Masters is a RPG game set in the NSA, A country that is full of violence and crime. The rules are simple, convince each citizen to make right choices. Each character will play a huge role in shaping the NSA, but this will not be an easy task. This country is full of hate, rage, wickedness, and destruction, and it seems like a negative force has grabbed hold of everyone, but don't give up! With the Path masters on your side you have all the help you need.
